title: Exploring the New Frontiers of Technology
content:
Introduction In recent years, rapid advancements in technology have paved the way for transformative changes across industries. This article delves into the key areas of Artificial Intelligence (AI), Blockchain, Internet of Things (IoT), and Big Data.
1. Artificial Intelligence (AI) AI is revolutionizing the way we approach complex problems. Here are some primary applications:
Natural Language Processing (NLP): Tools like GPT-3 allow for complex language generation. Machine Learning (ML): Applied across various sectors, from healthcare to finance. Computer Vision: Enhancing image recognition capabilities, such as facial recognition. Did you know? AI is expected to contribute up to $15.7 trillion to the global economy by 2030.
Key Statistics Year AI Market Size (in billion USD) 2020 50 2023 150 2030 1000 2. Blockchain Blockchain is more than just cryptocurrency; it’s a secure, decentralized ledger technology.
# Sample code in YAML format for blockchain configuration network: name: "ethereum" consensus: "PoS" nodes: 5 4. 数学公式示例 在这一部分，展示一些相关的数学公式，例如：

$$ \sum_{i=1}^n i = \frac{n(n+1)}{2} $$
